messages.title: Supporting Young People
messages.content: Stephen has worked hard for young people locally securing an "Inspired Facilities" grant... Stephen and his team also saved the Polegate Windmill.

messages.title: A real record of fighting for Eastbourne
messages.content: From successfully campaigning to save the DGH services to securing government investment for local infrastructure, Stephen Lloyd has been standing up for Eastbourne & Willingdon...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning to save the DGH services; worked to deliver better local NHS cancer treatment...

mentions.tacticalSituation: Eastbourne & Willingdon has a clear choice between Liberal Democrat Stephen Lloyd and the Conservative Candidate.

issues.health: Stephen's campaign led to improved local NHS cancer treatment... and is pushing for the Sovereign Harbour Health Centre...

leaflet.personalStatement: Stephen Lloyd: the independent-minded Liberal Democrat... It's why so many local residents want him to continue as OUR MP.

politicalExperience.achievements: Saved vital services at DGH; led the campaign that delivered better NHS cancer treatment locally; secured government investment for the Arndale Centre and the town's colleges.

images.caption: Stephen Lloyd and his team saved the Polegate Windmill.
Stephen Lloyd opened the new all-weather pitch at Hampden Park...
Stephen Lloyd - A real record of fighting for Eastbourne.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Claims to be the only candidate who lives in the constituency; highlights the choice between a Liberal Democrat MP or a Conservative one; states Stephen Lloyd is independent-minded...
